attributes.action: call on Wigan Council to give the people of Wigan and Leigh a referendum on the proposed congestion charge for Greater Manchester.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bolton Council has taken the stance of trusting the people of that borough to make the right decision on the proposed congestion charge.

Wigan Council has already voted in favour of the plan thus denying its residents the chance to democratically express their opinion.

This petition asks the Prime Minister to call on Wigan Council to reconsider its decision and give the public of Wigan & Leigh a referendum.
